tables.name: quasar_atom_pro_lp_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction data from LP (Liquidity Pool) transactions within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the trading activity and token movements within these pools. The data is sourced from various blockchains within the ecosystem.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Atomic swap transaction identifier

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of party initiating the swap transaction

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Identifier of the liquidity pool involved in the swap

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block containing the transaction

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of swap transaction (e.g., token swap, staking, etc.)

columns.name: raw_tokens
columns.description: Raw amount of tokens exchanged in the swap transaction

columns.name: base_asset
columns.description: Base asset involved in the swap transaction (e.g., native token)

columns.name: base_amount
columns.description: Base amount of the base asset exchanged in the swap

columns.name: base_amount_usd
columns.description: Base amount of the base asset exchanged in USD

columns.name: base_price
columns.description: Exchange price of the base asset in the swap transaction

columns.name: asset
columns.description: Asset involved in the swap transaction (e.g., token symbol)

columns.name: asset_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of the asset exchanged in USD

columns.name: asset_price
columns.description: Exchange price of the asset in the swap transaction

tables.name: quasar_osmo_pro_lp_transactions
tables.description: This dataset contains financial transactions for OSMO liquidity pool (LP) assets across the Cosmos ecosystem blockchain. It provides information on the sender and receiver of funds, transaction timestamps, and asset values.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Cosmos Hub transaction

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account initiating a transaction on the network

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Identifier for the liquidity pool participating in the transaction

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction block was mined and confirmed

columns.name: type
columns.description: Classification of the transaction type (e.g., LP token transfer)

columns.name: raw_tokens
columns.description: Raw amount of tokens involved in the transaction

columns.name: osmo_asset
columns.description: Identifier for the Osmosis asset involved in the transaction

columns.name: osmo_amount
columns.description: Amount of Osmosis assets transferred in the transaction

columns.name: osmo_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of Osmosis assets transferred in USD

columns.name: osmo_price
columns.description: Current price of Osmosis assets in USD

columns.name: asset
columns.description: Identifier for the asset involved in the transaction

columns.name: asset_amount
columns.description: Amount of the asset transferred in the transaction

columns.name: asset_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of the asset transferred in USD

columns.name: asset_price
columns.description: Current price of the asset in USD
